set.name: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 1

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may shieldify a card from your hand face up.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 1

property.name: Rules
property.value: {KIRIFUDASH} {N2} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Nature 2 to summon this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 1

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 1

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GALAXYSHIELD} {LW2} (You may pay Light/Water 2 instead of the cost of using this card. If you do, put this card into your shields face up.) ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. {GALAXY GO} ■ At the start of your turn, if this card is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.)
